Text: Re EMCA Call for newsletter articlesHowdy Julie Heres an item for the newsletter Im directing the Rice Light Opera Society in their inaugural production of The Mikado Performances are March Tickets are for nonstudents For reservations directions and more information can all be found at rlos Thanks Joe Carl White Singer Consultant Humanitarian Yahoo Groups Sponsor Buy Stock for No Minimums FREE Money BgmYkBVovDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Bomar and MorganWhen I called and wrote a couple of years ago about his corner Glenda Scott I think said she would dispatch an engineer who a couple of months later wrote me a letter saying everything was fine with the corner We all must be suffering from the same delusion On Wednesday February at PM Gayle Rodgers Rodgers Ramsey Inc wrote There has been a lot of documentation done on this location and the standing water problem and it certainly merits taking up again It will in fact take an infrastructure fixa good item for Capital Improvements and far more likely to get attention than new curbs and gutters which are missing in many if not most innercity neighborhoods Gayle Ramsey zaeza wrote Part Type Plain Text textplain Encoding quotedprintable To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms Joe Carl White Singer Consultant Humanitarian

Re EMCA citizens patrolTIf the information is physical handouts I could scan it in and post it on the EMCA website If it is aural I could record it and post it as an MP on the website I am still interested but still do not have Tuesdays free Joe Carl White Singer Consultant Humanitarian See the Mikado March rlos Yahoo Groups Sponsor Buy Stock for No Minimums FREE Money BgmYkBVovDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA sidewalk obstructionTo whom should one complain if appeals to the owner fail about renegade shrubbery that has overgrown a sidewalk On Tuesday January at AM Chris Collins wrote Sound is rightI heard him barking this morning again I guess he was calling out to Indy to see if he could come out to play wrote It wasnt him he is home safe and sound Original Message From zaeza mailto Sent Monday January PM To Subject Re EMCA missing dog is his dog missing I had to take that puppy to the spca cause he was an escape artist somebody told me that a family had taken this dog in for about a week but it kept getting out and they didnt want the responsibility anymore Original Message From To Sent Monday January AM Subject RE EMCA missing dog That could be Zorro he lives at Bomar Gary is his dad Original Message From zaeza mailto Sent Saturday January PM To Subject EMCA missing dog anyone missing or know someone who is missing a young black male labmix found him wandering around the street today not very carwise Nathalie Bomar To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service Do You Yahoo Yahoo Auctions Great stuff seeking new owners Bid now To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service Joe Carl White Singer Consultant Humanitarian
